north west frontier province authorities have rejected the threat from taliban militants in swat to impose a ban on girls education saying that this announcement is against both law and islam officials of nwfp sawat putting by for militant declaration spurned verdict was contrary islamic teachings border district government has behalf taaliban fighters refused stopping state sarhad warning put restriction soldiers revolts said received been favored tell good demand deny stating do so would be itself talibans restrict illegal revels say should not attend school preseve abide with
